name: unnamed-td
description:
Just like Plants VS Zombies, you need to stop enemies from reaching the left side of the screen. However, you have no control as to what structures you are gonna get. It's randomly given out. The initial buildable space is also randomized and limited. As you progress, you will be able to expand your territory and upgrade your defenses. 

How long can you survive?

TIP: Click the "Help?" button on the bottom-left side of the screen.

All art and sound effects are placeholders/temporary.

Feel free to give feedbacks/suggestions in the comments.
